Details

Command-or-noun conjunctions. These words and groups of words can be used to separate commands from one another, and can also be used to separate noun phrases in a noun list. `grammar `[`commandOrNounConjunction`](../object/commandOrNounConjunction.html)`(main)`` :   `[`BasicProd`](../object/BasicProd.html)
